item.description:
At just 4.4 miles (round trip), Mt. Hale is one of the shorter 4000 footers. Though, Zealand road may still be closed so there will be an added 5 miles of flat road to hike from 302. Total mileage would be 9.4 miles.

Book time for Mt. Hale is 4 hr 30 min plus another 2 hours for Zealand Road (1 hour in, 1 hour out) would be around 6.5 hours or so for the whole hike.

The weather will be warm; temps in the 60s at the trailhead and 50s at the summit. Be prepared for ice and mud on the trail. There is still freezing temperatures over night, so bring microspikes. We may need them higher up on the trail.

Trailhead weather forecast:
http://forecast.weather.gov/MapClick.php?lat=44.236427&lon=-71.487126
Meet at the parking lot across from Zealand campground. (See the link below)

Parking lot:
http://local.google.com/maps?saddr=Lower+Falls+Rd&hl=en&ll=44.262904,-71.4925&spn=0.0268,0.061712&sll=44.265056,-71.49426&sspn=0.011002,0.030856&geocode=Fe5uowIdDBW9-w&mra=ls&
item.name: Mt. Hale (4,054 footer)
